title: Why Why Why, Soy Sack 1.24.20
itunes:title: Why Why Why, Soy Sack 1.24.20
description:
In episode 555, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Who's Your God? and Views From The Vista co-host Steve Hernandez to discuss James Corden's Carpool Karaoke scandal, Joe Biden's reaction to a reporter asking him about Bernie Sanders, impeachment updates, the new Sonic movie, Crystal Geyser dumping arsenic into California's ecosystem, if you can taste with your testicles, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. James Corden Has Been Exposed In A Viral Tweet That Shows He Does Not Actually Drive The "Carpool Karaoke" Car
  2. WATCH: After a campaign event in Mason City, Iowa, @joebiden reacts to @edokeefe's question about his ongoing feud with @BernieSanders: "Calm down, it's okay." 
  3. Biden to CBS reporter: 'Why, why, why, why, why?'
  4. POLL-Let them speak: Most Americans want witnesses in Trump impeachment trial
  5. Trump shows anxiety as Democrats lay out case against him in Senate impeachment trial
  6. Mick Mulvaney becomes top Democratic impeachment target
  7. U.S. senators on 'digital detox' as they hear Trump's impeachment trial
  8. Republican Senators Are Literally Playing With Kids’ Toys During The Impeachment Trial
  9. Judge Andrew Napolitano: Trump's Senate impeachment trial -- What does it take to remove a president?
  10. Tucker Carlson began his show dismissing the #ImpeachmentTrial by comparing it to "a movie written & directed by children whose ending you already know, & by the way, it's 20 hours long, in Hungarian, with misspelled subtitles." That's how his viewers will process things.
  11. ‘Sonic The Hedgehog’ Could Jump As High As $47M In Opening Weekend – Box Office
  12. Crystal Geyser Water Pleads Guilty to Dumping Arsenic into California's Ecosystem
  13. No, you can’t taste anything with your testicles
  14. WATCH: Menahan Street Band - The Traitor

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
